name: Ski-Doo Snowmobile Challenge
description: Shred snow, ice, and your opponents across 25 insane circuits with twenty fully authentic Ski-Doo sleds. Perform death-defying stunts to get your pulse pounding as you scream by your opponents at over 100Mph. Customize your sled with paint, decals, and upgrades while you race across five different countries through Snow Cross, Hill Cross, Cross Country, and Freestyle events.
